bug.author: yueguoguo
bug.description: It would be great that the HyperparamBuilder can return parammap, which is sometimes desirable if some one uses the param builder together with a native Spark estimator.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/imatiach-msft>@imatiach-msft</denchmark-link> is there any update on this issue?
fix has been merged to master, should be available in v0.16
